 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּג‎</span>, seldom <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּג‎</span>] **verb** ==move away, backslide== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> erroneous; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***go and come*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1459</sup>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abitus et adventus*** [[BDB#Frey|Frey]] ([[BDB#Kam|Kam]])); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָג‎</span> [[Ps.53.4|Ps 53:4]] ***Imperfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסוֺג‎</span> [[Ps.80.19|Ps 80:19]] ***Participle active*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּג‎</span> [[Prov.14.14|Prov 14:14]] ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB § 124c</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:50f»§§ 50f</sup>, «GKC:72p»72p); — ***backslide, prove recreant to*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Ps.80.19|Ps 80:19]] so absolute [[Ps.53.4|Ps 53:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּג לֵב‎</span> [[Prov.14.14|Prov 14:14]] ***a backslider in heart.*** **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסוֺג‎</span> [[Ps.44.19|Ps 44:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשׂוֺג‎</span> [[2Sam.1.20|2Sam 1:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span>); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסוּגֹּ֫תִי‎</span> [[Isa.50.5|Isa 50:5]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסֹ֫גוּ‎</span> [[Isa.42.17|Isa 42:17]]; [[Jer.38.22|Jer 38:22]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסַּג‎</span> [[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72dd»§ 72dd</sup>, but see below); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמֹּ֫גוּ‎</span> [[Ps.35.4|Ps 35:4]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסֹּ֫גוּ‎</span> [[Ps.78.57|Ps 78:57]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסוֺג‎</span> [[Isa.59.13|Isa 59:13]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסוֺגִים‎</span> [[Zeph.1.6|Zeph 1:6]]; [[Jer.46.5|Jer 46:5]] — 

**1.** reflexive ***turn oneself away, turn back :*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** literally of Jonathan's bow [[2Sam.1.22|2Sam 1:22]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> (see [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative = prove faithless (as **Qal**): (1) of human friends, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחוֺר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נס‎</span> [[Jer.38.22|Jer 38:22]] (absolute); usually (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאַחֲרֵי י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נס‎</span> [[Zeph.1.6|Zeph 1:6]] compare [[Isa.59.13|Isa 59:13]] so absolute [[Ps.78.57|Ps 78:57]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּגַד‎</span>), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחוֺר‎</span> [[Isa.50.5|Isa 50:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרִיתִי‎</span>), [[Ps.44.19|Ps 44:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטָה מִן‎</span>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִסַּג כְּלִמּוֺת‎</span> [[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]] could mean ***reproaches do not depart***, i.e. cease ([[BDB#Hi|Hi]]-[[BDB#St|St]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#RV|RV]]); [[BDB#Now|Now]] proposes also (emending following see) ***shall not disgrace depart from Jacob's house ?*** [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup> conjecture, plausibly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשִּׂיג‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׂג‎</span>) ***disgrace shall not overtake us***. 

**2.** ***be truned or driven back, be repulsed***, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>'s foes: + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחוֺד‎</span> [[Jer.46.5|Jer 46:5]]; [[Isa.42.17|Isa 42:17]]; [[Ps.35.4|Ps 35:4]]; [[Ps.40.15|Ps 40:15]] = [[Ps.70.3|Ps 70:3]]; [[Ps.5|Ps 5]]. 

**Hiph\`il 1.** usually of ***displacing, moving back*** a boundary mark (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבוּ‎</span>), ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּסִּיג‎</span> [[Deut.19.14|Deut 19:14]], jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּסֵג‎</span> [[Prov.22.10|Prov 22:10]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשִּׂיגוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.2|Job 24:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסִּיג ג‎</span> [[Deut.27.17|Deut 27:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסִּיגֵי ג‎</span> [[Hos.5.10|Hos 5:10]]. 

**2.** ***remove carry away***, valuables, to rescue them, jussive, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּסֵּג‎</span> [[Mic.6.14|Mic 6:14]] si vera lectio (on synt.see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§§ 152, 1. 2; 155 Obs.</sup>) **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֻסַּג אָחוֺר מִשְׁפָּט‎</span> [[Isa.59.14|Isa 59:14]] ***and justice is driven back*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְדָקָה מֵרָחוֺק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲמֹד‎</span>). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוג‎</span> [[Ezek.22.18|Ezek 22:18]] see following.
